title: Love Your Frenemies
description: Kimmy knows everyone hates her, but when she comes back after a long disappearance, she has a nagging feeling that things aren't exactly what she thought them to be.First of all, there's her first love, the very sexy Manolo who used to have a nasty habit of breaking her heart. Then there's her bride-to-be BFF whom Kimmy means to write out of her life right after the wedding. And there's her mother who Kimmy can't wait to abandon - again.Is Kimmy headed for more disaster, or can a girl everyone hates finally get a clue and find happiness?Librarian's Note: This is an alternate cover edition, ISBN 10: 9719902248
author: Mina V. Esguerra
